name: Ambient.Prologue
description:
"Isn't the snow on this red leaves feels even colder then usual?" 

Welcome to the world of endless winter! The world where every nation hopelessly search for the better, warmer land. The world where even the brightest virtues feel like cruel lies. The world that you going to explore with young students of the most powerful unicorn of the land, two sisters - Astrum and Krinita. Follow their story, feel the amazing atmosphere of the world, defeat powerful and majestic bosses and be sure to try out every amazing spell available, and fully enjoy this game.
